description: Structured information on a brain atlas (version level).

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/autho._instruction: If necessary, add one or several authors (person or organization) that contributed to the production and publication of this brain atlas version. Note that these authors will overwrite the once provided in the brain atlas product this version belongs to.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/autho.description: Creator of a literary or creative work, as well as a dataset publication.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/autho.title: author

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/coord._instruction: Add the common coordinate space in which this brain atlas version exists in.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/coord.description: Two or three dimensional geometric setting.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/coord.title: coordinateSpace

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.title: digitalIdentifier

definedIn._instruction: Add one or several files in which this parcellation terminology version is stored in.
definedIn.description: Reference to a file instance in which something is stored.
definedIn.title: definedIn

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this parcellation terminology version.
fullName.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
fullName.title: fullName

hasEntityVersion._instruction: Add all parcellation entity versions which belong to this parcellation terminology version.
hasEntityVersion.title: hasEntityVersion

isAlternativeVersionOf._instruction: Add one or several alternative versions to this parcellation terminology version.
isAlternativeVersionOf.description: Reference to an original form where the essence was preserved, but presented in an alternative form.
isAlternativeVersionOf.title: isAlternativeVersionOf

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the earlier version of this parcellation terminology version.
isNewVersionOf.description: Reference to a previous (potentially outdated) particular form of something.
isNewVersionOf.title: isNewVersionOf

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this parcellation terminology version.
ontologyIdentifier.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
ontologyIdentifier.title: ontologyIdentifier

shortName._instruction: Enter a descriptive short name for this parcellation terminology version.
shortName.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
shortName.title: shortName

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this parcellation terminology version.
versionIdentifier.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
versionIdentifier.title: versionIdentifier

versionInnovation._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this parcellation terminology version.
versionInnovation.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
versionInnovation.title: versionInnovation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt._instruction: Add one or several alternative versions to this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt.description: Reference to an original form where the essence was preserved, but presented in an alternative form.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt.title: isAlternativeVersionOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew._instruction: Add the earlier version of this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.description: Reference to a previous (potentially outdated) particular form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.title: isNewVersionOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen._instruction: Add the license for this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen.description: Grant by a party to another party as an element of an agreement between those parties that permits to do, use, or own something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen.title: license

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.title: ontologyIdentifier
